original_text: And the cherubims were lifted up. This is the living creature that I saw by the river of Chebar.
korean_text: 그룹들이 올라가니 그들은 내가 그발 강 가에서 보던 생물이라

sentences.original_text: And the cherubims were lifted up.
that I saw by the river of Chebar.
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 그 바르 강가에서 본 생물이다.
